properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 2:55AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River and Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* until further notice.
* At 2 AM Tuesday the stage was 19.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Maximum forecast stage of 22.7 feet on Thursday, February 13.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise to near 22 feet this afternoon and
hold nearly steady through Wednesday. A second crest near 22.7
feet is forecast for Wednesday night.
* At 23.0 feet...Bigbee Road just west of the river will flood.
Access to several homes will be restricted. Large area of farm land
will flood west of the river.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon or
sooner if conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
